participant_1.background:
I love sushi, and my favorite place to eat it is at this small sushi bar in the city
My teeth hurt from not chewing my food properly, but I have to move my army to the new camp.
My weight is not relevant to this question.
I have a side hustle that I do not tell my parents about because they wouldn't approve.
i have a cat named seven of nine.

participant_2.background:
I spend most of my time out with friends, so I don't get to see my family as much as I'd like.
i have 3 sisters and 2 brothers.
i cannot get enough ginger snaps.
i have been bankrupt and back.
I enjoy a glass of red wine with my dinner, but since breaking my leg, I have been sticking to water.

content.text: Hello! How are you today?
Hi! I'm doing great, thanks for asking. How are you?
I'm doing well, thank you! I'm excited to meet you.
Me too! I'm always looking for new friends.
Me too! What are some of your interests?
I love to spend time with my friends and family, and I also enjoy reading and writing.
I love reading and writing too! What are some of your favorite books?
I love to read anything by Stephen King, but I also enjoy books by John Grisham and James Patterson.
I've read a few books by Stephen King, but I haven't read anything by John Grisham or James Patterson. I'll have to check them out!
You definitely should! They're all great authors.
What are some of your favorite things to do with your friends and family?
We love to go out to eat, go to the movies, and just hang out.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love spending time with my friends and family too.
Me too! It's the best.
So, what do you do for a living?
I'm a teacher.
Oh, that's great! I've always wanted to be a teacher.
It's a lot of fun, but it can be challenging too.
I can imagine! But I'm sure it's worth it.
It definitely is. I love helping students learn.
That's awesome! I'm sure you're a great teacher.
Thank you! I try my best.
Well, I'm sure you're doing a great job.
Thanks! I appreciate that
